title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 232-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 232-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
applies to all alternative solvent dry cleaning equipment not listed as an
exempt activity under Part 201 of this Title. Water-based cleaning processes
(wet cleaning) and those using only liquid carbon dioxide are exempt from this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
232-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 09, eff. 3/9/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
